TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HMAC extends System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm
Public MustInherit Class HMAC Inherits KeyedHashAlgorithm

summary.span: 表示基于哈希的消息验证代码 (HMAC) 的所有实现必须从中派生的抽象类。

span.span: Represents the abstract class from which all implementations of Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) must derive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基于哈希的消息身份验证代码 (HMAC) 可以用于确定是否通过不安全通道发送的消息已被篡改，前提是发送方和接收方共享机密密钥。A Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) can be used to determine whether a message sent over an insecure channel has been tampered with, provided that the sender and receiver share a secret key. 发件人计算原始数据的哈希值，并将原始数据和 HMAC 传送一条消息。The sender computes the hash value for the original data and sends both the original data and the HMAC as a single message. 接收方重新计算上收到的消息的哈希值，并检查计算哈希值与传输的哈希值相匹配。The receiver recomputes the hash value on the received message and checks that the computed hash value matches the transmitted hash value. HMAC 可与任何迭代的加密哈希函数，例如 MD5 或 SHA-1，共享密钥与结合使用。HMAC can be used with any iterative cryptographic hash function, such as MD5 or SHA-1, in combination with a secret shared key. HMAC 加密强度取决于基础的哈希函数的属性。The cryptographic strength of HMAC depends on the properties of the underlying hash function. 对数据或哈希值的任何更改产生不匹配，因为更改消息和重新生成正确的哈希值需要的机密密钥。Any change to the data or the hash value results in a mismatch, because knowledge of the secret key is required to change the message and reproduce the correct hash value. 因此，如果原始与计算所得的哈希值匹配，消息进行身份验证。Therefore, if the original and computed hash values match, the message is authenticated.

MemberSignature.Value: protected HMAC ();
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Protected Sub New ()
protected: HMAC();

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected int BlockSizeValue { get; set; }
.property instance int32 BlockSizeValue
Protected Property BlockSizeValue As Integer
protected: property int BlockSizeValue { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置哈希值中使用的块大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the block size to use in the hash value.

value.span: 哈希值中使用的块大小。

span.span: The block size to use in the hash value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基于哈希的消息身份验证代码 (HMAC) 使用的哈希函数，其中哈希数据后通过循环上的数据块的基本压缩函数。A Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) uses a hash function where data is hashed by iterating a basic compression function on blocks of data. 是此类块的字节大小。 is the byte size of such a block. 其值为 64 个字节。Its value is 64 bytes.

summary.span: 创建基于哈希的消息验证代码 () 实现的实例。

span.span: Creates an instance of an implementation of a Hash-based Message Authentication Code () .

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Security.Cryptography.HMAC Create ();
.method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Cryptography.HMAC Create() cil managed
Public Shared Function Create () As HMAC
public: static System::Security::Cryptography::HMAC ^ Create();

summary.span: 创建基于哈希的消息验证代码 (HMAC) 默认实现的实例。

span.span: Creates an instance of the default implementation of a Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC).

returns.span: 新的 SHA-1 实例，除非已使用 [<cryptoClass> 元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/cryptography/cryptoclass-element.md)更改默认设置。

span.span: A new SHA-1 instance, unless the default settings have been changed by using the [<cryptoClass> element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/cryptography/cryptoclass-element.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，此重载使用 sha-1 的 HMAC 实现。By default, this overload uses the SHA-1 implementation of HMAC. 如果你想要指定不同的实现，使用重载，它可让你改为指定算法名称。If you want to specify a different implementation, use the overload, which lets you specify an algorithm name, instead.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Security.Cryptography.HMAC Create (string algorithmName);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Cryptography.HMAC Create(string algorithmName) cil managed
Public Shared Function Create (algorithmName As String) As HMAC
public: static System::Security::Cryptography::HMAC ^ Create(System::String ^ algorithmName);

param.name: algorithmName
param.span: 要使用的 HMAC 实现。

span.span: The HMAC implementation to use.

param.span: 下表显示 algorithmName 参数的有效值以及它们映射到的算法。

span.span: The following table shows the valid values for the algorithmName parameter and the algorithms they map to.

summary.span: 创建基于哈希的消息验证代码 (HMAC) 指定实现的实例。

span.span: Creates an instance of the specified implementation of a Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC).

returns.span: 指定的 HMAC 实现的新实例。

span.span: A new instance of the specified HMAC implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HMAC 支持大量的哈希算法，包括 MD5、 SHA 1、 SHA 256 个字节和 RIPEMD160。HMAC supports a number of hash algorithms, including MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, and RIPEMD160. 有关完整列表，请参阅支持的值`algorithmName`参数。For the full list, see the supported values for the `algorithmName` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 密钥更改合法时释放由 类使用的非托管资源，并可选择释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the class when a key change is legitimate and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和`Finalize`方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the `Finalize` method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Finalize` 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。`Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在重写，请注意不要引用在以前调用之前释放对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void HashCore (ReadOnlySpan<byte> source);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void HashCore(valuetype System.ReadOnlySpan`1<unsigned int8> source) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub HashCore (source As ReadOnlySpan(Of Byte))
protected: override void HashCore(ReadOnlySpan<System::Byte> source);
protected override void HashCore (byte[] rgb, int ib, int cb);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void HashCore(unsigned int8[] rgb, int32 ib, int32 cb) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub HashCore (rgb As Byte(), ib As Integer, cb As Integer)
protected: override void HashCore(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ rgb, int ib, int cb);

span.span: The input data.

param.name: ib
param.span: 字节数组中的偏移量，从该位置开始使用数据。

span.span: The offset into the byte array from which to begin using data.

param.name: cb
param.span: 数组中用作数据的字节数。

span.span: The number of bytes in the array to use as data.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，将写入对象的数据路由给默认 哈希算法以计算哈希值。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, routes data written to the object into the default hash algorithm for computing the hash value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由应用程序代码不调用此方法。This method is not called by application code. 此抽象方法执行哈希计算。This abstract method performs the hash computation. 每次写入到加密流对象传递数据，通过此方法。Every write to the cryptographic stream object passes the data through this method. 对于每个数据块，此方法将更新哈希对象的状态，以便在数据流的末尾，则返回正确的哈希值。For each block of data, this method updates the state of the hash object so that a correct hash value is returned at the end of the data stream.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override byte[] HashFinal ();
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance unsigned int8[] HashFinal() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function HashFinal () As Byte()
protected: override cli::array <System::Byte> ^ HashFinal();

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，在加密流对象处理完最后的数据后完成哈希计算。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, finalizes the hash computation after the last data is processed by the cryptographic stream object.

returns.span: 字节数组中计算所得的哈希代码。

span.span: The computed hash code in a byte array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由应用程序代码不调用此方法。This method is not called by application code. 此方法完成任何部分计算并返回数据流的正确哈希值。This method finalizes any partial computation and returns the correct hash value of the data stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基于哈希的消息身份验证代码 (HMAC) 可以用于确定是否通过不安全通道发送的消息已被篡改，前提是发送方和接收方共享机密密钥。A Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) can be used to determine whether a message sent over an insecure channel has been tampered with, provided that the sender and receiver share a secret key. 发件人计算原始数据的哈希值，并将原始数据和 HMAC 传送一条消息。The sender computes the hash value for the original data and sends both the original data and the HMAC as a single message. 接收方重新计算上收到的消息的哈希值，并检查计算哈希值与传输的哈希值相匹配。The receiver recomputes the hash value on the received message and checks that the computed hash value matches the transmitted hash value. HMAC 可与任何迭代的加密哈希函数，例如 MD5 或 SHA-1，共享密钥与结合使用。HMAC can be used with any iterative cryptographic hash function, such as MD5 or SHA-1, in combination with a secret shared key. HMAC 加密强度取决于基础的哈希函数的属性。The cryptographic strength of HMAC depends on the properties of the underlying hash function. 对数据或哈希值的任何更改将导致不匹配，因为更改消息和重新生成正确的哈希值需要的机密密钥。Any change to the data or the hash value will result in a mismatch, because knowledge of the secret key is required to change the message and reproduce the correct hash value. 因此，如果原始与计算所得的哈希值匹配，消息进行身份验证。Therefore, if the original and computed hash values match, the message is authenticated.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于哈希算法的密钥。

span.span: Gets or sets the key to use in the hash algorithm.
The key to use in the hash algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是加密哈希算法的密钥。This property is the key for the keyed hash algorithm. 基于哈希的消息身份验证代码 (HMAC) 可以用于确定是否通过不安全通道发送的消息已被篡改，前提是发送方和接收方共享机密密钥。A Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) can be used to determine whether a message sent over an insecure channel has been tampered with, provided that the sender and receiver share a secret key. 发件人计算原始数据的哈希值，并将原始数据和 HMAC 传送一条消息。The sender computes the hash value for the original data and sends both the original data and the HMAC as a single message. 接收方重新计算上收到的消息的哈希值，并检查计算哈希值与传输的哈希值相匹配。The receiver recomputes the hash value on the received message and checks that the computed hash value matches the transmitted hash value. HMAC 可与任何迭代的加密哈希函数，例如 MD5 或 SHA-1，共享密钥与结合使用。HMAC can be used with any iterative cryptographic hash function, such as MD5 or SHA-1, in combination with a secret shared key. HMAC 加密强度取决于基础的哈希函数的属性。The cryptographic strength of HMAC depends on the properties of the underlying hash function. 对数据或哈希值的任何更改产生不匹配，因为更改消息和重新生成正确的哈希值需要的机密密钥。Any change to the data or the hash value results in a mismatch, because knowledge of the secret key is required to change the message and reproduce the correct hash value. 因此，如果原始与计算所得的哈希值匹配，消息进行身份验证。Therefore, if the original and computed hash values match, the message is authenticated.

exception.span: 试图在哈希计算开始后更改 属性。

span.span: An attempt is made to change the property after hashing has begun.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override bool TryHashFinal (Span<byte> destination, out int bytesWritten);
